skills.name: Binding “Clip”
skills.description:
Passive Effect: When a trap is triggered, deals 350% ATK as Physical damage and binds the target for 3 second(s)
Active Effect: Immediately gets 1 trap

skills.name: Launching “Clip”
skills.description:
Passive Effect: When a trap is triggered, deals 380% ATK as Physical damage and pushes the target away significantly
Active Effect: Immediately gets 1 trap

talents.name: "Clip" Specialist
talents.description: Can deploy up to 10 <@ba.talpu>(+2)</> “Clip” traps (Can store up to 10); The first enemy that steps on a trap will trigger its effect
